name: > Fix Everything <
description:
Mission Objective

"The rules of the universe has just been broken. Litteraly.
The culprit is somewhere in this hotel. Your mission, should you choose to accept it, will be to fix these rules... and anything else you come across on your way."

Credits Game Developers
  • Tim MARTIN-VIGIER (Game Design, Level Design, Programmation, Sound)
  • Dylan CARPENTIER  (Programmation, 3D Modeling)
3D Assets

Most of the 3D assets of the game were not made by us (we're not 3D artists!).

They come either from the Unity Assets Store, or from the website CGTrader, and they are all free to be used for non-commercial purpose.

3D Models and Materials from Unity Assets Store:

  • 15 Original Wood Texture
  • Basic Metal Texture Pack
  • Flatscreen TV
  • Big Furniture Pack
  • 10 Skyboxes Pack : Day - Night
  • 20 Man Made Ground Materials
  • PBR Tile Texture Floor
  • Round Carpet
  • Shooting Gallery - Enviroment Pack
  • Old Nightstand
  • Clipboard

3D Models from CGTrader:

  • basic door Free 3D model
  • Plastic Window Free 3D model
  • Bathtub size 1800x800 Free 3D model
  • Key01 Free 3D model
Fonts

All fonts come from Dafont:

  • Good Times Font
  • Abecedary Font
